snippet: The executive, who was angry about the way she was served nuts, was charged with violating aviation safety regulations and conspiring to hush up the affair.
abstract: Cho Hyun-ah, former Korean Air executive who flew into rage at first-class cabin crew during flight, forcing plane back to gate at Kennedy Airport, is indicted on criminal charges of violating aviation safety regulations and conspiring to conceal episode.
lead_paragraph: The executive, who was angry about the way she was served nuts, was charged with violating aviation safety regulations and conspiring to hush up the affair.

headline.main: Former Executive of Korean Air Is Indicted in ‘Nut Rage’ Episode
headline.print_headline: Ex-Korean Air Executive Is Indicted in ‘Nut Rage’ Episode
